definition: to reflect (producing an inverted image)
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)

sentences.english: The reflections from the fireworks twinkled in the river.
sentences.chinese: 煙火倒映在河面上，閃爍多姿。

sentences.english: The pavilions throw their shadows in the water.
Say forever to say who will not change reflected the childish boy.
sentences.chinese: 說相愛到永遠說誰都不會變倒映着稚嫩的少年。

sentences.english: One can see the reflection of the tower in the water.
The trees on the shore line were reflected in the clear water.
sentences.chinese: 沿岸的樹木在清清的河水裏倒映出來。

sentences.english: Shining tears in the eyes, reflected in your room dark brown eyes.
sentences.chinese: 閃爍着淚花的眼，倒映在你黑褐色的雙眸間。

sentences.english: A fair-sized tabular iceberg reflected in the calm waters of Kane Basin.
sentences.chinese: 凱恩海灣平靜的水面倒映着一箇中等大小的桌狀冰山。

sentences.english: Some fishing boats were becalmed just in front of us.
sentences.chinese: 漁船倒映在水裏的影子，似乎是在水面上睡着了一樣。

sentences.english: Staring on your face reflected in a pool of water?
sentences.chinese: 直視水池中倒映出的自己的臉孔？

sentences.english: Burj Al Arab Hotel reflected on beach at sunset.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚，倒映在海灘上的迪拜伯瓷酒店。

sentences.english: Reflection Of Sailboat Masts In Lake Maggiore, Locarno, Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 帆船桅倒映在湖面上，洛迦諾，瑞士。

sentences.english: Nearby Mirror Lake offers beautiful reflections of the surrounding cliffs.
sentences.chinese: 附近的鏡湖給遊客欣賞到水中的懸崖峭壁倒映。

sentences.english: The placid lake reflected the image of the old castle.
sentences.chinese: 平靜的湖面倒映着古堡的影像。

sentences.english: Choi Ha dance reflecting the water.
The willow's shadow falls on the lake.
sentences.chinese: 垂柳的影子倒映在湖面上。

sentences.english: And then beyond the Reflecting Pool, the dignified columns of the Lincoln Memorial.
sentences.chinese: 倒映池的那邊，是林肯紀念堂莊嚴的大理石柱。

definition: inverted image/reversed image (e.g. upside down)
to shine upon/to reflect
gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
clear and crystalline (of water)
to shine/to illuminate
to set off by contrast/antithesis/analogy parallelism (linguistics)
to reflect/to shine
limpid/crystal clear
dark blue
azure
water and sky merge in one color (idiom)
hidden from view/alternately hidden and visible/setting off each other
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
to ripple/to undulate/also written 蕩漾|荡漾
(of a light source) to cast one's light on/to project (an image)
picturesque
